title: Social Media-Based Self-Directed Learning Space Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience with social media (SNS) platforms
context.additional_context: A language learning competency enhancement course for working professionals, emphasizing self-directed learning spaces via social media in VR simulation environments with personal device utilization

learning_goals: Learners can design self-directed learning spaces by utilizing social media tools in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can analyze and compare the affordances (utilization potential) of digital learning environments tailored to their learning needs.
Learners can develop reusable learning space prototypes through collaboration with peer learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
